title: #245: Loose Lips Sink Ships (@MarkNorm)
itunes:title: Loose Lips Sink Ships with Mark Normand
description: Mark Normand came over to my apartment to have a discussion about keeping one’s mouth shut. Mark gets into trouble all the time for sharing too much and I wanted to talk about what that means, and the repercussions therein, and if it’s even possible for a comedian to share too much. And we meandered a crudload so it’s not entirely about having a big mouth.
